text: Hi, anyone know if it's possible to create a staged version of a blog post, to test a new template? Or how would one best test a new template? Thanks for any pointers .

Hey! I have this weird bug on my templates, that I need some help with. My subpage-template has a side navigation that pulls in the related website section's links. This works fine all over the site. Now I have noticed, that when I change a page's template to another, the sidenav doesn't display at all. What could be causing this? The template that are used, are working fine on other pages.

ergh. I've added a style sheet to the site via website/pages/all-domains/page-templates but it's not appearing, and it doesn't show up in the domain stylesheets listing when I look at a page's settings. What'm I missing?
Also, if I make changes to a template that's being used by a bunch of pages... shouldn't my changes be reflected when I then view those pages?
